Emoji.description:
Displays tracked emoji usage in messages and reactions. Only tallies currently active emojis. 

 If nothing is added to the command, it will print the server's total usage. 

 __**Subcommands**__

fields.name: `;emoji` | `;emoji s` | `;emoji server`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for the current server.
___

fields.name: `;emoji u @someone` | `;emoji user @someone`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for a specific mentioned user.
___

fields.name: `;emoji thinking` | `;emoji emoji thinking`
fields.value:
Get a list of usage by person of a currently active server emoji.
___

fields.name: time
fields.value:
;emoji 1s | ;emoji u 2min | ;emoji e 3h | ;emoji @user 4d | ;emoji 5m | ;emoji 10y

Can be added to the end of the command to limit the scope of time. Must be an integer combined with a valid key.

E.description:
Displays tracked emoji usage in messages and reactions. Only tallies currently active emojis. 

 If nothing is added to the command, it will print the server's total usage. 

 __**Subcommands**__

fields.name: `;e` | `;e s` | `;e server`

___

fields.name: `;e u @someone` | `;e user @someone`
fields.value:
Get emoji usage for a specific mentioned user.
___

fields.name: `;e thinking` | `;e emoji thinking`
fields.value:
Get a list of usage by person of a currently active server emoji.
___

fields.name: time
fields.value:
;e 1s | ;e u 2min | ;e e 3h | ;e @user 4d | ;e 5m | ;e 10y

Can be added to the end of the command to limit the scope of time. Must be an integer combined with a valid key.

Wlink.description:
Generates a link by combining the server's registered wiki site and a user provided page name.
___

fields.name: Name Search
fields.value:
;wlink Madoka

Given first or last name, generates a link to character's page.
___

fields.name: Shortcuts
fields.value: Users can create single keyword shortcuts using the `wadd` command. This command will first search through shortcuts to find pages before generating a link based on user provided text.

W.description:
Generates a link by combining the server's registered wiki site and a user provided page name.
___

fields.name: Name Search
fields.value:
;w Nanaka

Given first or last name, generates a link to character's page.
___

fields.name: Shortcuts
fields.value: Users can create single keyword shortcuts using the `wadd` command. This command will first search through shortcuts to find pages before generating a link based on user provided text.

Wadd.description:
Adds a single word keyword as a shortcut to a longer page for `wlink` for the server.
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
;wadd favorite Tokiwa Nanaka

When a user enters `;wlink favorite`, it will link as if the user entered `;wlink Tokiwa Nanaka`
___

Wdelete.description:
Deletes an existing single word keyword shortcut added by `;wadd`.
___

fields.name: Usage
fields.value:
;wdelete favorite

This deletes the keyword `favorite` from the list of shortcuts if previously set.
___

Help.description:
Use `;help command` to get help texts for specific commands.

__**List of Commands**__

fields.name: w or wlink
fields.value:
Generate link to the server's registered wiki.
___

React.description:
Use `;react command to apply supported custom emotes to specified messages.  The custom emotes can be found in our other emote servers.
**Syntax:** ;react <message-ID> <emote-ID or $shortcut$>

R.description:
Use `;r command to apply supported custom emotes to specified messages.  The custom emotes can be found in our other emote servers.
**Syntax:** ;r <message-ID> <emote-ID or $shortcut$>
